select t.id, t.title, t.ep_rule as epRule, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.last_pay_time as lastPayTime, t.is_show as isShow, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_date as updateDate, t.add_user_id as addUserId, t.is_del as isDel, t.note as note from tb_ep_sale t where t.is_del = 0
and t.title like "%"#{param.title}"%"
order by t.id desc

select concat(ep.id,'') id, ep.title, ep.ep_rule as erRule, ep.start_time as startTime, ep.end_time as endTime, case when epImg.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",epImg.file_group,"/",epImg.ref_id,"/",epImg.file_name) end as epImg, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,ep.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as erSatus from tb_ep_sale ep left join tb_file_info epImg on epImg.ref_id=ep.id where ep.is_del=0

select concat(ep.id,'') id, ep.title, ep.ep_rule as erRule, ep.start_time as startTime, ep.end_time as endTime, case when epImg.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",epImg.file_group,"/",epImg.ref_id,"/",epImg.file_name) end as epImg from tb_ep_sale ep inner join tb_file_info epImg on epImg.ref_id=ep.id where ep.is_del=0 and ep.id = #{epSaleId};

select t.id, t.title, t.ep_rule as epRule, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.last_pay_time as lastPayTime, t.is_show as isShow, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_date as updateDate, t.add_user_id as addUserId, t.is_del as isDel, t.note as note from tb_ep_sale t where t.is_del = 0 and t.id = #{id};
select t.id, t.*, from tb_num where tb_num.status=2 and t.id = #{id};

select concat(goodsInfo.gId,'')as gId, goodsInfo.gName, goodsInfo.gAd, goodsInfo.gImg, goodsInfo.gSatus, goodsInfo.gStartPrice, numSaleInfo.priceCount, numSaleInfo.currentPrice, goodsInfo.numId, goodsInfo.skuId, goodsInfo.num from ( select tb_num.id as numId, tb_goods.g_active as gEPSaleId, tb_goods.g_id as gId, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as gSatus, tb_goods.g_name as gName, tb_goods.g_ad as gAd, tb_sku.sku_tob_price as gStartPrice, case when tb_file_info.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",tb_file_info.file_group,"/",tb_file_info.ref_id,"/",tb_file_info.file_name) end as gImg, tb_sku.sku_id as skuId, tb_num.num_resource as num from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_file_info.file_group='goodsPic' and tb_file_info.seq=1 and tb_num.status=2 ) goodsInfo left join (select count(tb_auction.id) as priceCount, max(tb_auction.price) as currentPrice, tb_auction.num_id as numId from tb_auction group by tb_auction.num_id) numSaleInfo on numSaleInfo.numId=goodsInfo.numId where goodsInfo.gEPSaleId = #{ePSaleId}

select goodsInfo.gId, goodsInfo.gName, goodsInfo.gAd, goodsInfo.gSatus, goodsInfo.gStartPrice, numSaleInfo.priceCount, numSaleInfo.currentPrice from ( select tb_num.id as numId, tb_goods.g_active as gEPSaleId, tb_goods.g_id as gId, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as gSatus, tb_goods.g_name as gName, tb_goods.g_ad as gAd, tb_sku.sku_tob_price as gStartPrice from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id inner join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_num.status=2 ) goodsInfo left join (select count(tb_auction.id) as priceCount, max(tb_auction.price) as currentPrice, tb_auction.num_id as numId from tb_auction group by tb_auction.num_id) numSaleInfo on numSaleInfo.numId=goodsInfo.numId where goodsInfo.gId = #{goodsId}

select tb_num.id as numId, tb_num.end_time as endTime, tb_goods.g_start_num as startNum, tb_goods.g_deposit as depositPrice from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_num.status=2

select concat(tb_num.id,'')as numId, concat(tb_goods.g_id,'')as gId, case when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())<0 then 1 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.start_time, now())>=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())<=0 then 2 when TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,tb_num.end_time, now())>0 then 3 else 0 end as gSatus, tb_goods.g_name as gName, tb_goods.g_ad as gAd, tb_sku.sku_tob_price as gStartPrice, concat(tb_sku.sku_id,'')as skuId, tb_num.num_resource as num, tb_goods.g_price_up as gPriceUp, tb_goods.g_deposit as gDeposit, tb_goods.g_loop_time as gLoopTime, tb_num.start_time as gStartTime, tb_num.end_time as gEndTime from tb_num inner join tb_sku on tb_num.sku_id=tb_sku.sku_id inner join tb_goods on tb_goods.g_id=tb_sku.g_id where tb_goods.g_is_auc=1 and tb_goods.g_is_sale=1 and tb_num.status=2 and tb_goods.g_id = #{goodsId}

insert into tb_ep_sale( id, title, ep_rule, start_time, end_time, last_pay_time, is_show, create_date, update_date, add_user_id ) values
( #{EPSale.id}, #{EPSale.title}, #{EPSale.epRule}, #{EPSale.startTime}, #{EPSale.endTime}, #{EPSale.lastPayTime}, #{EPSale.isShow}, #{EPSale.createDate}, #{EPSale.updateDate}, #{EPSale.addUserId} )
mapper.update: update tb_ep_sale t set t.title=#{title}, t.ep_rule=#{epRule} , t.start_time=#{startTime} , t.end_time=#{endTime} , t.last_pay_time=#{lastPayTime} , t.is_show=#{isShow} , t.update_date=#{updateDate} where t.id = #{id}
update tb_ep_sale a set a.is_del =1 where a.id = #{id}
